import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../ProductDisplay/ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../assets/star_icon.png' import star_dull_icon from '../assets/star_dull_icon.png' export const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(Number(1)); useEffect(() => { if (quantity!=Number(1)){ return setQuantity(Number(1)) } },[]) return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price*quantity}
nice shirt

Select Size

S
L
XL
XXL

Select Quantity

quantity===Number(1)?setQuantity(Number(1)):setQuantity(quantity-Number(1))}>- setQuantity(Number(e.target.value))} /> setQuantity(quantity+Number(1))}>+

Category: Women,T-Shirt,Crop-Top

Tags: Modern,Latest

) }
